Content: Cultures and ideologies should travel along trade lines and within the
same polity. In practice and regard to polities this would mean, that
evey politiy node would average over its subnodes and pull on them
depending on the bounding strength/how close teh subnode is associated
with the parent node. They should also travel between borders or
especially open borders, even if trade is not present. They should
travel faster within one culture and ideologies should travel faster
